snippet: Binod Chaudhary, chairman of CG Corp. Global, a Nepal-based conglomerate, says to be a great leader one must think ahead.
lead_paragraph: Binod Chaudhary, chairman of CG Corp. Global, a Nepal-based conglomerate, says to be a great leader one must think ahead.

headline.print_headline: Beyond Tradition: A Need to Adapt and to Anticipate Change
headline.main: A Need to Adapt and to Anticipate Change
